20110126191235.000|20110126191238.000|TR0|If that particular site has customer 
20110126191238.000|20110126191241.000|TR0|records like people's names, Social 
20110126191241.000|20110126191244.000|TR0|Security numbers, e-mail addresses -- 
20110126191244.000|20110126191247.000|TR0|e-mail addresses are extremely valuable 
20110126191247.000|20110126191249.000|TR0|for spammers -- personal identifying 
20110126191249.000|20110126191252.000|TR0|information like Social Security numbers 
20110126191252.000|20110126191255.000|TR0|for identity theft.  And what he does he 
20110126191255.000|20110126191258.000|TR0|actually put in a shopping list.  He 
20110126191258.000|20110126191301.000|TR0|called it high-value information, and the 
20110126191301.000|20110126191303.000|TR0|price would be higher.
20110126191303.000|20110126191306.000|TR0|

20110126191309.000|20110126191312.000|TR0|

20110126191315.000|20110126191318.000|TR0|for -- at the high end of the road.  So,

20110126191320.000|20110126191323.000|TR0|

20110126194008.000|20110126194010.000|TR0|due to be raised again in the next few 
20110126194010.000|20110126194013.000|TR0|weeks, and that's why politicians are 
20110126194013.000|20110126194016.000|TR0|racing to see who can cut more spending 
20110126194016.000|20110126194019.000|TR0|faster.
20110126194019.000|20110126194022.000|TR0|
20110126194022.000|20110126194024.000|TR0|But here's the catch.  By law or by 
20110126194024.000|20110126194027.000|TR0|choice, they are focused on a very small 
20110126194027.000|20110126194030.000|TR0|slice of the total budget.  76 cents out 
20110126194030.000|20110126194033.000|TR0|of every dollar the federal government 
20110126194033.000|20110126194036.000|TR0|(AUDIO GAP) spends goes for things that 
20110126194036.000|20110126194038.000|TR0|can't be cut.  Medicare, Medicaid, Social 
20110126194038.000|20110126194041.000|TR0|Security and so-called entitlements, plus 
20110126194041.000|20110126194044.000|TR0|interest on the money we borrowed before.

20110126194143.000|20110126194146.000|TR0|Entitlements and interest will take up 92

20110126195124.000|20110126195126.000|TR0|RACHEL SKLAR, EDITOR-AT-LARGE,
